org.gservlet

Interface FileListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileAdapter

    public interface FileListener
extends EventListener
    Interface for receiving notification events about files changes
    Author:
    Mamadou Lamine Ba

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCreated(FileEvent event)
      Receives notification that a file has been created
      void onDeleted(FileEvent event)
      Receives notification that a file has been deleted
      void onModified(FileEvent event)
      Receives notification that a file has been modified

    • Method Detail

      • onCreated

        void onCreated(FileEvent event)
        Receives notification that a file has been created
        Parameters:
        event - the FileEvent containing the file that was created

      • onDeleted

        void onDeleted(FileEvent event)
        Receives notification that a file has been deleted
        Parameters:
        event - the FileEvent containing the file that was deleted

      • onModified

        void onModified(FileEvent event)
        Receives notification that a file has been modified
        Parameters:
        event - the FileEvent containing the file that was modified
